verses.verse: I <S%H3045>know<s%> that you <S%H3201>can<s%> do <S%H3605>every<s%> thing, and that <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4209>thought<s%> can be <S%H1219>withheld<s%> from you.

<S%H4310>Who<s%> is he that <S%H5956>hides<s%> <S%H6098>counsel<s%> <S%H1097>without<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge?<s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> have I <S%H5046>uttered<s%> that I <S%H995>understood<s%> not; things too <S%H6381>wonderful<s%> for me, which I <S%H3045>knew<s%> not.
<S%H8085>Hear,<s%> I <S%H4994>beseech<s%> you, and I will <S%H1696>speak:<s%> I will <S%H7592>demand<s%> of you, and <S%H3045>declare<s%> you to me.
I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> of you by the <S%H8088>hearing<s%> of the <S%H241>ear:<s%> but <S%H6258>now<s%> my <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H7200>sees<s%> you.

And it was so, that <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> to <S%H347>Job,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> the <S%H8489>Temanite,<s%> My <S%H639>wrath<s%> is <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against you, and against your <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7453>friends:<s%> for you have not <S%H1696>spoken<s%> of me the thing that is <S%H3559>right,<s%> as my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%> has.

Therefore <S%H3947>take<s%> to you <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6499>bullocks<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%> and <S%H3212>go<s%> to my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H347>Job,<s%> and <S%H5927>offer<s%> up for yourselves a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering; and my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%> shall <S%H6419>pray<s%> for you: for him will I <S%H5375>accept:<s%> <S%H1115>lest<s%> I <S%H6213>deal<s%> with you after your <S%H5039>folly,<s%> in that you have not <S%H1696>spoken<s%> of me the thing which is <S%H3559>right,<s%> like my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H347>Job.<s%>

So <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> the <S%H8489>Temanite<s%> and <S%H1085>Bildad<s%> the <S%H7747>Shuhite<s%> and <S%H6691>Zophar<s%> the <S%H5284>Naamathite<s%> <S%H3212>went,<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> according as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>commanded<s%> them: the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> also <S%H5375>accepted<s%> <S%H347>Job.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7725>turned<s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H347>Job,<s%> when he <S%H6419>prayed<s%> for his <S%H7453>friends:<s%> also the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3254>gave<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H4932>twice<s%> as <S%H637>much<s%> as he had before.

Then <S%H935>came<s%> there to him <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H269>sisters,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> they that had been of his <S%H3045>acquaintance<s%> <S%H6440>before,<s%> and did <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> with him in his <S%H1004>house:<s%> and they <S%H5110>bemoaned<s%> him, and <S%H5162>comforted<s%> him <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H935>brought<s%> on him: every <S%H376>man<s%> also <S%H5414>gave<s%> him a piece of <S%H7192>money,<s%> and <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> an <S%H5141>earring<s%> of <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

So the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the <S%H319>latter<s%> end of <S%H347>Job<s%> more than his <S%H7225>beginning:<s%> for he <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H6246><s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1581>camels,<s%> and a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6776>yoke<s%> of <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> and a <S%H505>thousand<s%> she <S%H860>asses.<s%>

And he <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H7223>first,<s%> <S%H3224>Jemima;<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H8145>second,<s%> <S%H7103>Kezia;<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H7992>third,<s%> <S%H7163>Kerenhappuch.<s%>

And in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> were <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> so <S%H3303>fair<s%> as the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H347>Job:<s%> and their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> their <S%H251>brothers.<s%>

<S%H310>After<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%> an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons'<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> even <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H1755>generations.<s%>
